text: The A1 Team Austria is the Austrian team of A1 Grand Prix, an international racing series. It was involved only in the first A1 Grand Prix season. == Owners == A1 Team Austria seat holder is Lauda Motorsport Management. == Drivers == The main driver for the Austrian team was Mathias Lauda. {|class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 85%" width="80%" |- !
